greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The first Fibonacci based variant of arithmetic derivative: a(p) = A000045(p) for prime p, a(u*v) = a(u)*v + u*a(v), with a(0) = a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1001
formula: a(n) = n * Sum e_j * A000045(p_j)/p_j for n = Product p_j^e_j.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2019
